title: Gadget Heaven
description: A one-stop destination for tech enthusiasts to explore the latest gadgets and accessories. Featuring detailed product reviews, comparisons, and exclusive deals, this platform helps users make informed decisions and stay updated with cutting-edge technology.
challenges: Designing mock search and filter functionalities to simulate e-commerce behavior.
improvements: Enabling a comparison tool to help users evaluate multiple gadgets side by side.

title: Adopt Your Pets
description: A compassionate platform connecting animals in need with loving homes. This website showcases profiles of adoptable pets, provides information on care, and features a streamlined process for adoption inquiries. Aiming to create lasting bonds between pets and families.
challenges: Creating mock profiles with realistic details to mimic real-world data for a better user experience.
improvements: Adding advanced search filters like breed, age, and location to improve navigation.

title: Donate Bangladesh
description: A dedicated site for supporting meaningful causes through donations. It offers a secure and transparent system to contribute to various campaigns, track impact, and inspire community-driven change. Perfect for charities, fundraisers, and personal initiatives.
challenges: Designing a visually compelling layout that conveys trust and transparency.
improvements: Adding a backend to manage campaigns, track donations, and provide user authentication.
